title: Styra
description: Styra was an ancient port city located in the southwestern part of Euboea that possessed also an inland acropolis (on the modern peak of Hagios Nikolaos), extensive quarries, and a series of large stone structures known today as drakospita (dragon's houses).

properties.description: Representative location derived from an OpenStreetMap node
properties.title: OSM location of Akropolis of Styra - Kastro Armeno
